com.ephesoft.dcma.barcode

Class BarcodeReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ephesoft.dcma.barcode.BarcodeReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICommonConstants

    @Component
public class BarcodeReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICommonConstants
    This class reads the bar-code on each image file fetched from batch.xml, processes images with Zxing library to find the barcode information for each image and writes the extracted information to batch xml to be used by subsequent plugins.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Ephesoft
    See Also:
    ICommonConstants, BatchSchemaService

    • Nested Class Summary

      static class  BarcodeReader.BarcodeReaderTypes
      Enum for Barcode Reader types possible values are CODE39, QR, DATAMATRIX.
